forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 60F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny with gusty winds. High 16C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with lots of sunshine. High 61F. Winds NNW at 25 to 35 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Gusty winds early. Low 6C. NNW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low around 45F. NNW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
